Package it.polimi.ingsw.PSP14.client.view

Interface UI

All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface UI
This abstract class has to be implemented by a CLI or GUI (for example). It contains a set of abstract methods that have to be specifically implemented by the CLI or GUI. It contains a set of utility functions that

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String askUsername()
    Prompt the player to provide a username.
    int chooseAvailableGods​(java.util.List<GodProposal> gods)
    Ask the (hosting) player to choose a god that will be added to a pool from which the players will be able to choose from before a game start.
    int chooseBuild​(java.util.List<BuildProposal> moves)
    Ask a player for the destination of their next build action, where the next tower block will be built if possible.
    int chooseFirstPlayer​(java.util.List<PlayerProposal> proposals)
    Ask the player to choose another player (even themselves) from a list.
    int chooseGod​(java.util.List<GodProposal> proposals)
    Prompt the player to select a god from the list of available gods.
    int chooseMove​(java.util.List<MoveProposal> moves)
    Ask a player for the destination of their next move.
    int chooseWorker​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices)
    Ask the player to choose a worker from a list
    int[] chooseWorkerInitialPosition()
    Ask a player for the starting position of one of their workers.
    int chooseYesNo​(java.lang.String message)
    Ask the player if they want to perform a certain action.
    void gameStart()  
    UIColor getColor​(int playerNumber)
    Get a color depending on the player unique id.
    int getLobbySize()
    Ask the host how many players should participate in the match.
    void incrementCell​(Point position)
    Increment the tower height at the specified cell position by 1.
    void moveWorker​(Point newPosition, int workerId, java.lang.String playerUsername)
    Move a worker of a player to a new position
    void registerPlayer​(java.lang.String newPlayerUsername)
    Add a new player to the match by providing their username.
    void setDome​(Point position)
    Add a dome (marking a tower as complete) to the specified cell position.
    void setWorker​(Point position, int workerId, java.lang.String playerUsername)
    Set a player's worker in a target position.
    void showNotification​(java.lang.String s)
    Display a notification to the player.
    void showVictory​(java.lang.String winner)
    Notify the players that there's a winner
    void startBuild​(java.lang.String player)
    Ask the player where they want to build
    void startMove​(java.lang.String player)
    Ask the player where they want to move the worker
    void startWorkerChoice​(java.lang.String player)
    Ask the player to choose a worker to move
    void startWorkerPlacement​(java.lang.String player)
    Ask the player where to position the workers at the start of the match
    void unregisterPlayer​(java.lang.String username)
    Remove a player from the match.
    void update()
    Calls an update of the UI implementation.
    void updateGod​(java.lang.String player, java.lang.String god)
    This method is called when a player has been assigned a god.
    void welcome()
    Display a greeting to the player.

  • Method Details

    • gameStart

      void gameStart() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException

    • registerPlayer

      void registerPlayer​(java.lang.String newPlayerUsername)
      Add a new player to the match by providing their username.
      Parameters:
      newPlayerUsername - the username of the player you want to register (you get this from the server)

    • unregisterPlayer

      void unregisterPlayer​(java.lang.String username) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Remove a player from the match. This will remove the player and all of its workers from this match.
      Parameters:
      username - the username of the player you want to remove
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • startWorkerChoice

      void startWorkerChoice​(java.lang.String player) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask the player to choose a worker to move
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to choose the worker
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • startMove

      void startMove​(java.lang.String player) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask the player where they want to move the worker
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to choose where to move
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • startBuild

      void startBuild​(java.lang.String player) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask the player where they want to build
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to choose where to build
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • startWorkerPlacement

      void startWorkerPlacement​(java.lang.String player) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask the player where to position the workers at the start of the match
      Parameters:
      player - the player that has to place the workers
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • showVictory

      void showVictory​(java.lang.String winner) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Notify the players that there's a winner
      Parameters:
      winner - the winner's name
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • setWorker

      void setWorker​(Point position, int workerId, java.lang.String playerUsername) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Set a player's worker in a target position. If the player does not own a worker with that workerId, a new worker will be instantiated.
      Parameters:
      position - the target position
      workerId - the ID of the player's worker
      playerUsername - the owner of the worker
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • moveWorker

      void moveWorker​(Point newPosition, int workerId, java.lang.String playerUsername) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Move a worker of a player to a new position
      Parameters:
      newPosition - the target destination of the worker
      workerId - the worker to move
      playerUsername - the worker's owner
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • incrementCell

      void incrementCell​(Point position) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Increment the tower height at the specified cell position by 1.
      Parameters:
      position - position
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • setDome

      void setDome​(Point position) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Add a dome (marking a tower as complete) to the specified cell position.
      Parameters:
      position - the position
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • update

      void update()
      Calls an update of the UI implementation. Use this to display changes in data.

    • getColor

      UIColor getColor​(int playerNumber)
      Get a color depending on the player unique id.
      Parameters:
      playerNumber - an int between 1 and 3
      Returns:
      a color

    • welcome

      void welcome() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Display a greeting to the player.
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • getLobbySize

      int getLobbySize() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask the host how many players should participate in the match.
      Returns:
      the size of the lobby
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • showNotification

      void showNotification​(java.lang.String s)
      Display a notification to the player.
      Parameters:
      s - the content of the notification

    • askUsername

      java.lang.String askUsername() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Prompt the player to provide a username.
      Returns:
      the chosen username
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • chooseGod

      int chooseGod​(java.util.List<GodProposal> proposals) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Prompt the player to select a god from the list of available gods.
      Parameters:
      proposals - the list of available gods
      Returns:
      the index of the chosen god
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • chooseFirstPlayer

      int chooseFirstPlayer​(java.util.List<PlayerProposal> proposals) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask the player to choose another player (even themselves) from a list.
      Parameters:
      proposals - the list of players to choose from
      Returns:
      the index of the chosen player
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • chooseWorker

      int chooseWorker​(java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> choices) throws java.lang.InterruptedException, java.io.IOException
      Ask the player to choose a worker from a list
      Parameters:
      choices - the list of workers
      Returns:
      the index of the chosen worker
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it fails to communicate with the server
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • chooseAvailableGods

      int chooseAvailableGods​(java.util.List<GodProposal> gods) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask the (hosting) player to choose a god that will be added to a pool from which the players will be able to choose from before a game start.
      Parameters:
      gods - a list of the available gods
      Returns:
      the index of the chosen god
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • chooseWorkerInitialPosition

      int[] chooseWorkerInitialPosition() throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask a player for the starting position of one of their workers.
      Returns:
      A tuple [x,y] of the worker coordinates
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • chooseMove

      int chooseMove​(java.util.List<MoveProposal> moves) throws java.lang.InterruptedException, java.io.IOException
      Ask a player for the destination of their next move.
      Parameters:
      moves - a list of possible moves to choose from
      Returns:
      the Index of the chosen move
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it fails to communicate with the server
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • chooseBuild

      int chooseBuild​(java.util.List<BuildProposal> moves) throws java.lang.InterruptedException, java.io.IOException
      Ask a player for the destination of their next build action, where the next tower block will be built if possible.
      Parameters:
      moves - a list of options to choose from
      Returns:
      the Index of the chosen option
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if it fails to communicate with the server
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • chooseYesNo

      int chooseYesNo​(java.lang.String message) throws java.lang.InterruptedException
      Ask the player if they want to perform a certain action. This handles only the confirm (positive or negative).
      Parameters:
      message - the text to display
      Returns:
      0 = no, 1 = yes
      Throws:
      java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted

    • updateGod

      void updateGod​(java.lang.String player, java.lang.String god)
      This method is called when a player has been assigned a god.
      Parameters:
      player - the player's username
      god - the name/id of the god
